title: Hack the Horizon
description: A 24-hour hackathon focused on solving real-world problems using technology. Teams will ideate, build, and present functional prototypes.

title: CodeSprint
description: An intense competitive programming contest testing logic, speed, and accuracy across multiple problem sets.

title: Robo Rumble
description: A robotics-based battle event where custom-built bots compete in an arena of challenges and obstacles.

title: Pixel Perfect
description: A digital design competition focused on creativity, UI/UX sense, and visual storytelling.

title: Tech Talk Series
description: Expert-led sessions on emerging technologies, career paths, and real-world engineering practices.
